slhua\bg@mail.\bhcue.edu.tw\t Abstr\tct.\tThe\tpurpose\tof\tdesig\bi\bg\tthe\tlexical\tsema\btic\treprese\btatio\b\tmodel\tE-HowNet\tis\t for\t \batural\t la\bguage\t u\bdersta\bdi\bg.\t E-HowNet\t is\t a\t frame-based\t e\btity-relatio\b\t model\t exte\bded\tfrom\tHowNet\tto\tdefi\be\tlexical\tse\bses\ta\bd\tachievi\bg\tcompositio\bal\tsema\btics.\tThe\t followi\bgs\tare\tmajor\texte\bsio\b\tfeatures\tof\tE-HowNet\tto\tachieve\tthe\tgoal.\ta)\tWord\tse\bses\t (co\bcepts)\t are\t defi\bed\t by\t either\t primitives\t or\t a\by\t well-defi\bed\t co\bcepts\t a\bd\t co\bceptual\t relatio\bs;\tb)\tA\tu\biform\tse\bse\treprese\btatio\b\tmodel\tfor\tco\bte\bt\twords,\t fu\bctio\b\t words\t a\bd\t phrases;\t c)\t \fema\btic\t relatio\bs\t are\t explicitly\t expressed;\t a\bd\t d)\t Near-ca\bo\bical\t represe\btatio\bs\t for\t lexical\t se\bses\t a\bd\t phrasal\t se\bses.\t We\t demo\bstrate\t the\t above\t features\t a\bd\tshow\thow\tcoarse-grai\bed\tsema\btic\tcompositio\b\tca\b\tbe\tcarried\tout\tu\bder\tthe\tframework\t of\t E-HowNet.\t Possible\t applicatio\bs\t of\t E-HowNet\t are\t also\t suggested.\t We\t hope\t that\t the\t ultimate\t goal\t of\t \batural\t la\bguage\t u\bdersta\bdi\bg\t will\t be\t accomplished\t after\t future\t improveme\bt\ta\bd\tevolutio\b\tof\tthe\tcurre\bt\tE-HowNet.\t Key\bords:\tE-HowNet,\tcompositio\bal\tsema\btics,\tlexical\tsema\btic\treprese\btatio\bs\t

sections.title: 1 Introduction
paragraphs: E-HowNet\t is\t a\t lexical\t sema\btic\t represe\btatio\b\t model\t exte\bded\t from\t HowNet\t a\bd\t he\bce\t i\bherits\tthe\tbasic\tframework\tof\tHowNet.\tHowNet\tis\ta\b\to\b-li\be\tcommo\b-se\bse\tk\bowledge\tbase\t i\bdexi\bg\trelatio\bs\tof\tco\bcepts\tgathered\tfrom\tlexico\bs\tof\tChi\bese\ta\bd\tE\bglish\t(Do\bg\ta\bd\tDo\bg,\t 2006).\tEach\tco\bcept\tis\treprese\bted\ta\bd\tu\bderstood\tby\t its\t defi\bitio\b\t a\bd\t associated\t li\bks\t with\t other\tco\bcepts.\tFor\ti\bsta\bce,\tthe\tHowNet\tdefi\bitio\b\tof\tWarrior|戰士\tis\tas:\t \t {huma\b|人:belo\bg={army|軍隊},\t{fight|爭鬥:\tage\bt={~},\tdomai\b={military|軍}}}\t \t The\t represe\btatio\b\t says\t that\t a\t warrior\t is\t a\t huma\b\t i\b\t army\t who\t plays\t the\t role\t of\t age\bt\t i\b\t the\t eve\bt\tof\tmilitary\tfighti\bg.\tI\b\tHowNet,\tvocabulary\tof\tword\tse\bse\tdefi\bitio\b\tis\trestricted\tto\ta\tset\t of\t arou\bd\t two\t thousa\bds\t primitive\t co\bcepts,\t called\t sememes.\t A\t word\t se\bse\t is\t defi\bed\t by\t its\t hyper\bymy\t sememe\t a\bd\t additio\bal\t sema\btic\t features.\t HowNet\t has\t the\t followi\bg\t adva\btages\t over\tWordNet\t(Fellbaum,\t1998):\ta)\ti\bhere\bt\tproperties\tof\t co\bcepts\t are\t derived\t from\t e\bcoded\t feature\t relatio\bs\t i\b\t additio\b\t to\t hyper\bym\t co\bcepts,\t a\bd\t b)\t i\bformatio\b\t regardi\bg\t co\bceptual\t differe\bces\tbetwee\b\tdiffere\bt\tco\bcepts\ta\bd\ti\bformatio\b\tregardi\bg\tmorph-sema\btic\tstructure\tare\t e\bcoded.\tHowNet’s\tadva\btages\tmake\tit\ta\b\teffective\telectro\bic\tdictio\bary\tfor\tNLP\tapplicatio\bs.\t I\b\t rece\bt\t years,\t HowNet\t has\t bee\b\t applied\t to\t a\t variety\t of\t research\t topics\t i\bcludi\bg:\t word\t \t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\u\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t\t * \t\t This\tresearch\twas\tsupported\ti\b\tpart\tby\tthe\tNatio\bal\t\fcie\bce\tCou\bcil\tu\bder\ta\tCe\bter\tExcelle\bce\tGra\bt\tN\fC\t96-

2752-E-001-001-PAE\ta\bd\tGra\bt\tN\fC96-2221-E-001-023-MY3.\t \t \t Copyright\t2009\tby\tKeh-Jia\b\b\tChe\b\ta\bd\t\fhu-Li\bg\tHua\bg\t 1 23rd Pacific Asia Conference on Language, Information and Computation, pages 1–8 \t similarity\t(劉群,\t2002),\tmachi\be\ttra\bslatio\b\t(Do\bg,\t1999),\ta\bd\ti\bformatio\b\tretrieval\t(Dorr\tet\tal.,\t 2000),\tetc.\t\t

However,\t what\t i\bterests\t us\t here\t is\t how\t to\t use\t HowNet\t to\t achieve\t mecha\bical\t \batural\t la\bguage\tu\bdersta\bdi\bg.\tComputer\tu\bdersta\bdi\bg\trequires\ta\treprese\btatio\bal\tframework\twhich\t represe\bts\t k\bowledge\t about\t lexical\t co\bcepts\t a\bd\t performs\t sema\btic\t compositio\b\t a\bd\t se\bse\t disambiguatio\b.\t \fo\t far\t there\t has\t bee\b\t little\t research\t o\b\t applyi\bg\t HowNet\t to\t sema\btic\t compositio\b.\tWe\ttherefore\tpropose\ta\tframework\texte\bdi\bg\tHowNet,\tcalled\tE-HowNet,\tto\tdeal\t with\t this\t problem.\t I\b\t the\t followi\bg\t sectio\bs,\t this\t paper\t proposes\t a\t variety\t of\t i\bter-co\b\bected\t exte\bsio\bs\t to\t HowNet,\t resulti\bg\t i\b\t E-HowNet.\t \fectio\b\t 2\t describes\t multi-level\t co\bcept\t defi\bitio\bs\t which\t e\brich\t its\t o\btological\t relatio\bs.\t \fectio\b\t 3\t discusses\t methods\t to\t achieve\t sema\btic\tcompositio\b\twith\ta\tu\biform\treprese\btatio\bal\tframework\tfor\tboth\tfu\bctio\b\twords\ta\bd\t co\bte\bt\twords.\t\fectio\b\t4\tdefi\bes\ta\tprecise\tmea\bi\bg\tfor\tfunc\b\tons\t(disti\bct\tfrom\tthe\tloose\tuse\tof\t “fu\bctio\b\t words”)\t as\t special\t ki\bds\t of\t relatio\bs\t which\t maps\t co\bcepts\t to\t co\bcepts.\t \fectio\b\t 5\t addresses\tsome\tapplicatio\bs\tof\tE-HowNet.\tA\tsummary\ta\bd\tco\bclusio\bs\tare\tgive\b\ti\b\t\fectio\b\t6.\t

sections.title: 2 Building ontologic\tl rel\ttions bet\been concepts \bith multi-level definitions
paragraphs: HowNet\tuses\tprimitive\tco\bcepts,\tcalled\tsememes,\tto\tdefi\be\tall\tco\bcepts.\tFor\texample,\t‘狗 \fog’\t is\t defi\bed\t as\t def:\t {livestock|牲畜}.\t Usi\bg\t primitives\t to\t defi\be\t co\bcepts\t causes\t i\bformatio\b\t degradatio\b\t a\bd\t misses\t importa\bt\t o\btological\t relatio\bs\t betwee\b\t co\bcepts.\t For\t example,\t HowNet\tdefi\bes\t‘獅子狗 Be\tj\tng \fog’\tas\tdef:\t{livestock|牲畜}\tas\twell.\tFor\to\be,\tthe\tdefi\bitio\b\t fails\t to\t i\bdicate\t that\t this\t species\t has\t some\t co\b\bectio\b\t to\t Norther\b\t Chi\ba.\t \feco\bdly\t the\t hypo\bymy\trelatio\b\twith\t‘dog’\tis\tlost\ti\b\ttheir\tequivale\bt\tdefi\bitio\bs.\t\t

While\t we’ve\t adopted\t a\b\t e\btity-relatio\bal\t model,\t i.e.\t all\t co\bceptual\t relatio\bs\t are\t explicitly\t expressed,\t to\t defi\be\t word\t a\bd\t phrasal\t se\bses,\t co\bcepts\t are\t further\t defi\bed\t by\t both\t sy\bo\byms\t a\bd\t simpler\t co\bcepts,\t i\bstead\t of\t just\t sema\btic\t primitives.\t Furthermore,\t all\t attribute\t relatio\bs\t are\texplicitly\texpressed\t(陳克健\tet\tal.,\t2005).\tI\b\tE-HowNet\t‘獅子狗 Be\tj\tng \fog’\tis\tdefi\bed\tas\t def:{dog|狗:source={Beiji\bg|北京}}.\tThis\tki\bd\tof\tdefi\bitio\b\texplicitly\ti\bdicates\tthe\to\btological\t hypo\bymy\t relatio\b\t betwee\b\t ‘dog’\t a\bd\t ‘Beiji\bg\t dog’\t by\t usi\bg\t the\t co\bcept\t ‘dog’\t as\t the\t head\t se\bse.\tThus,\tthe\tco\bcept\tdefi\bitio\b\titself\tforms\ta\b\to\btological\t\betwork.\t\t

The\t set\t of\t HowNet\t sememes\t are\t also\t adopted\t i\b\t E-HowNet\t for\t grou\bd-level\t defi\bitio\bs.\t \fi\bce\t \bew\t co\bcepts\t ca\b\t be\t defi\bed\t by\t a\by\t well-defi\bed\t co\bcepts,\t defi\bitio\bs\t ca\b\t be\t dy\bamically\t decomposed\t i\bto\t lower\t level\t represe\btatio\bs\t u\btil\t the\t grou\bd-level\t defi\bitio\b\t is\t reached.\t At\t that\t poi\bt,\t all\t features\t i\b\t the\t defi\bitio\b\t are\t primitive\t co\bcepts,\t i.e.\t sememes.\t For\t i\bsta\bce,\tthe\ttop\tlevel\tdefi\bitio\b\tof\t‘文學系 \fepar\bmen\b of l\t\bera\bure’\tis\tshow\b\ti\b\t(1).\t

\t (1)\tdef:\t{school\tdepartme\bt|學系:\tpurpose={teach|教:\tlocatio\b={~},\ttheme={literature|文}}}.\t \t\t The\t symbol\t ‘~’,\t as\t i\b\t HowNet,\t refers\t to\t the\t head\t co\bcept\t of\t the\t defi\bitio\b\t which\t is\t ‘school\t departme\bt|學系’\t as\t i\b\t (1).\t \fi\bce\t the\t co\bcept\t ‘學系 school \fepar\bmen\b’\t is\t \bot\t a\t primitive\t co\bcept,\tthe\tabove\tdefi\bitio\b\tca\b\tbe\tfurther\texte\bded\ti\bto\tthe\tprimitive\tlevel\tdefi\bitio\b\t(1').\t \t (1')\tdef:{I\bstitutePlace|場所:\t\t \t \t \tdomai\b={educatio\b|教育},\tpurpose={study|學習:\t\tlocatio\b=\t{~}},\t \t \t \tpurpose=\t{teach|教:\t\tlocatio\b\t=\t{~},\ttheme={literature|文}}}.\t \t \fuch\t a\t multi-level\t represe\btatio\bal\t framework\t makes\t se\bse\t defi\bitio\bs\t more\t precise.\t It\t also\t retai\bs\t the\t adva\btage\t of\t usi\bg\t sema\btic\t primitives\t to\t achieve\t ca\bo\bical\t se\bse\t represe\btatio\b.\t Thus,\t the\t system\t aims\t to\t achieve\t both\t u\bambiguous\t defi\bitio\bs\t a\bd\t la\bguage\t i\bdepe\bde\bce.\t Followi\bgs\tare\tadditio\bal\tadva\btages\tof\tmultilevel\treprese\btatio\bs.\t 2
a.\t \fucci\bct\bess\ta\bd\tco\bsiste\bcy\tof\tdata\tma\bageme\bt\tca\b\tbe\tmai\btai\bed\tthrough\tmultilevel\t i\bherita\bce\tof\tmultilevel\tco\bceptual\thierarchies.\t

b.\t The\t similarity\t a\bd/or\t associatio\bs\t of\t two\t co\bcepts\t ca\b\t be\t derived\t by\t compari\bg\t their\t multilevel\treprese\btatio\bs.\t\fi\bce\teach\tlevel\tof\texpa\bsio\b\tresults\ti\b\ti\bformatio\b\tloss,\ta\t multilevel\tback\toff\tprocess\tca\b\tbala\bce\tbetwee\b\tge\berality\ta\bd\tprecisio\b.\t\t

c.\t Near-ca\bo\bical\treprese\btatio\b\tca\b\tbe\tachieved\tat\ta\tsuitable\tlevel\tof\treprese\btatio\b\tfor\t sy\bo\byms\tor\tparaphrases.\t d. \t New\tse\bses\tare\teasy\tto\tdefi\be\twhile\tmai\btai\bi\bg\tco\bsiste\bcy\tamo\bg\treprese\btatio\bs.\t

sections.title: 3 Uniform represent\ttion for content \bords \tnd function \bords for sem\tntic composition
paragraphs: O\be\tof\tHowNet’s\tobjectives\tis\tto\tdefi\be\tword\tse\bses\tthat\tca\b\texpress\tsy\bo\byms\twith\tide\btical\t represe\btatio\bs.\t I\b\t additio\b,\t the\t similarity\t of\t word\t se\bses\t ca\b\t be\t derived\t by\t compari\bg\t defi\bitio\bs.\tHowever\tthe\tE-HowNet’s\tobjectives\t\bot\to\bly\ti\bte\bd\tto\tachieve\tthe\tabove\tgoals\tbut\t also\tto\tapply\tsema\btic\tcompositio\b\tprocess\tto\tderive\tthe\tse\bses\treprese\btatio\bs\tfor\tphrases\ta\bd\t se\bte\bces.\t

HowNet\t works\t well\t for\t defi\bi\bg\t co\bte\bt\t words,\t but\t it\t does\t \bot\t express\t the\t se\bses\t of\t fu\bctio\b\t words\t well.\t I\b\t fact,\t fu\bctio\b\t words\t are\t all\t defi\bed\t by\t the\t same\t sema\btic\t head:\t {Fu\bcWord|功能詞:...}.\t To\t perform\t sema\btic\t compositio\b,\t it\t is\t esse\btial\t to\t have\t a\t u\biform\t framework\tcapable\tof\texpressi\bg\tthe\tdiversity\tof\tboth\tco\bte\bt\ta\bd\tfu\bctio\b\twords.\t

Li\bguistic\ttheories\tdisagree\tabout\tthe\tstatus\ta\bd\tor\tdefi\bitio\bs\tof\t“fu\bctio\b\twords”,\tbut\ti\b\ta\t ge\beral\t se\bse,\t fu\bctio\b\t words\t are\t words\t which\t typically\t satisfy\t sy\btactic\t requireme\bts,\t a\bd\t may\thave\tless\trefere\btial\tsig\bifica\bce.\tI\b\tfact,\tit\tis\tprobably\t\bot\tpossible\tto\tdivide\tse\bses,\tmuch\t less\t words,\t i\bto\t i\bdepe\bde\bt\t refere\btial\t a\bd\t sy\btactic\t uses.\t However,\t we\t ca\b\t still\t say\t that\t fu\bctio\b\twords\ti\bdicate\t‘li\bguistically’\tsig\bifica\bt\trelatio\bs.\tFor\texample,\tthe\tpassive\t‘被\tby’\tis\t a\t prepositio\b\t that\t i\btroduces\t a\b\t age\bt\t role/relatio\b.\t Thus,\t it\t i\bdicates\t relatio\bs\t betwee\b\t co\bstitue\bts\ti\b\ta\tse\bte\bce.\tAs\twell,\tthe\tmorpheme\t‘-ly’,\ti\b\ta\tword\tlike\t‘ge\btly’,\tcreates\ta\tbridge\t betwee\b\tthe\t‘ma\b\ber’\trelatio\b\tof\tits\tco\bte\bt\tse\bse\t‘ge\btle’\ta\bd\twhatever\tverb\tit\tco\b\bects\tto.\tI\b\t co\btrast,\t co\bte\bt\t words,\t particularly\t \bou\bs,\t have\t more\t i\bdepe\bde\bt\t refere\btiality\t a\bd\t less\t (or\t u\bder\tspecified)\trelatio\bal\tse\bse.\tVerbs\tde\bote\teve\bts\twhile\talso\tco\btributi\bg\tthe\tse\bse\tof\ttheir\t argume\bt\trelatio\bs.\tNou\bs\trefer\tto\tobjects\ta\bd\talso\treceive\troles\tfrom\tpredicates.\t\t

Thus,\t a\bticipati\bg\t the\t \bext\t sectio\b\t somewhat,\t E-HowNet\t treats\t both\t \bou\bs\t a\bd\t verbs\t as\t e\btities\tjoi\bed\tby\trelatio\bs\tof\tsema\btic\troles.\tFor\ti\bsta\bce,\t“Joh\b\tru\bs”=age\bt(ru\b,\tJoh\b)\twhich\t i\b\tE-HowNet\texpressio\b\tis\t{ru\b|跑:age\bt={Joh\b}}.\tThis\tki\bd\tof\tlogic\tis\tbasically\tequivale\bt\tto\t co\btemporary\teve\bt-orie\bted\tlogic\twhich\twould\twrite\texists:e(ru\b(e)\ta\bd\tage\bt(e,Joh\b)).\t

Thus,\twe\tclaim\tthat\tall\tword\ti\bterpretatio\bs\ti\bvolve\ttwo\ttypes\tof\tse\bse:\trelatio\b\tse\bse\ta\bd\t co\bte\bt\t se\bse.\t However,\t differe\bt\t sy\btactic\t categories\t could\t well\t be\t said\t to\t have\t differe\bt\t degrees\tof\tthese\tse\bses.\tA\tspectrum\tcould\tbe\tdiagrammed\tas\ti\b\tTable\t1.\tHowever,\tfor\ta\tlexical\t k\bowledge\treprese\btatio\b\tsystem\tto\ti\bcorporate\tcompositio\bality,\tit\tis\t\becessary\tto\te\bcode\tboth\t relatio\b\t se\bses\t a\bd\t co\bte\bt\t se\bses\t i\b\t a\t u\biform\t framework.\t E-HowNet\t is\t a\b\t e\btity-relatio\b\t model\tto\tachieve\treprese\btatio\bs\tof\tco\bte\bt/fu\bctio\b\tword\tse\bses\ta\bd\tse\bte\bce/phrasal\tse\bses.\t \fome\t E-HowNet\t represe\btatio\bs\t of\t word\t se\bses\t are\t show\b\t i\b\t Table\t 2.\t Their\t se\bse\t represe\btatio\bs\tare\telaborated\ti\b\tthe\tfollowi\bg\tsectio\b.\t 3 \t T\tble 1:\tThe\tse\bse\tspectrum\tfor\tsy\btactic\tcategories\t Fu\bctio\b\twords\t\t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t \t\t\t\t\tCo\bte\bt\twords\t Relatio\bal\tse\bses\t---------------------------------------------------------\tCo\bte\bt\tse\bses\t De,\tprepositio\bs,\tco\bju\bctio\bs,\tadverbs,\t........................,\tadjectives,\tverbs,\t\bou\bs\t

sections.title: 3.1 Lexic\tl represent\ttions \tnd b\tsic sem\tntic composition processes
paragraphs: I\b\tE-HowNet,\tthe\tse\bses\tof\tfu\bctio\b\twords\tare\treprese\bted\tby\tsema\btic\troles/relatio\bs\t(陳怡君\t et\tal.,\t2005).\tFor\texample,\tthe\tco\bju\bctio\b\t‘because’\tis\tdefi\bed\tas\tshow\b\ti\b\t(2).\tFu\bctio\b\twords\t li\bk\ttwo\te\btities,\tas\ti\bdicated\tby\tx\ta\bd\ty\tbelow.\t \t (2)\tbecause因為\t \t def:\treaso\b={};\twhich\tmea\bs\treaso\b(x)={y}\t(which\treads\tas\t‘reaso\b\tof\tx\tis\ty’)\twhere\tx\tis\tthe\t depe\bde\bcy\thead\ta\bd\ty\tis\tthe\tdepe\bde\bcy\tdaughter\tof\t‘because\t因為’.\t

I\b\ta\tsema\btic\tcompositio\b\tprocess,\tif\ttwo\tco\bstitue\bts\tare\tsy\btactically\tdepe\bde\bt,\ttheir\tE-HowNet\treprese\btatio\bs\twill\tbe\tu\bified\taccordi\bg\tto\tthe\tfollowi\bg\tbasic\tcompositio\b\tprocess:\t \t If\ta\tco\bstitue\bt\tB\tis\ta\tdepe\bde\bcy\tdaughter\tof\tco\bstitue\bt\tA,\ti.e.\tB\tis\ta\tmodifier\tor\ta\b\targume\bt\t of\tA,\tthe\b\tu\bify\tthe\tsema\btic\treprese\btatio\b\tof\tA\ta\bd\tB by\tthe\tfollowi\bg\tsteps.\t Step 1:\tDisambiguate\tthe\tse\bses\tof\tA\ta\bd\tB.\t Step 2:\tIde\btify\tthe\tsema\btic\trelatio\b\tbetwee\b\tA\ta\bd\tB to\tderive\trelatio\b(A)={B}.\t
Step 3:\t\tU\bify\t the\t sema\btic\t represe\btatio\b\t of\tA\t a\bd\tB\t by\t i\bserti\bg\t relatio\b(A)={B}\t as\t a\t subfeature\tof\tA.\t
\t
\fi\bce\tmethods\tfor\tword\tse\bse\tdisambiguatio\b\ta\bd\trelatio\b\tide\btificatio\b\tare\tout\tof\tthe\tscope\t of\tthis\tpaper,\twe\tset\tthose\tissues\taside.\t

sections.title: 4 Sem\tntic roles \tnd functions
paragraphs: E-HowNet\tis\ta\b\te\btity-relatio\b\tmodel\tas\tdescribed\tabove,\ti\b\twhich\te\btities\ti\bdicate\tobjects\tor\t eve\bts\t which\t have\t co\bte\bt\t se\bse,\t a\bd\t relatio\bs\t are\t sema\btic\t li\bks\t betwee\b\t e\btities.\t There\t are\t two\t differe\bt\t types\t of\t relatio\bs:\t sema\btic\t roles\t a\bd\t fu\bctio\bs\t (\bot\t to\t be\t co\bflated\t with\t the\t ge\beral\t se\bse\t of\t ‘fu\bctio\b\t word’\t described\t above).\t All\t sema\btic\t roles\t are\t bi\bary\t relatio\bs\t rel(x,y).\tThe\tparameter\tx\tusually\tis\tdepe\bde\bcy\thead\ta\bd\twe\twrite\trel(x,y)\tas\trel(x)={y},\twhich\t reads\t as\t ‘the\t rel\t of\t x\t is\t y’.\t For\t example,\t Age\bt(eat)={the\t dog}\t reads\t ‘the\t age\bt\t of\t the\t eve\bt\t eati\bg\tis\tthe\tdog’.\tI\b\tE-HowNet\tthe\tse\bte\bce\tof\t‘the\tdog\teat’\tis\texpressed\tas\t{eat:\tage\bt={the\t dog}}\t where\t ‘age\bt={the\t dog}’\t is\t a\b\t abbreviatio\b\t of\t ‘age\bt(~)={the\t dog}’.\t The\t symbol\t ‘~’\t de\botes\tthe\thead\tco\bcept\twhich\tis\t‘eat’\ti\b\tthis\texample.\tA\trelatio\b\trel(x)={y}\tis\tco\bsidered\ta\t mappi\bg\tfrom\tdomai\b(x)\tto\tra\bge(y).\tDomai\b\ta\bd\tra\bge\tare\tco\bstrai\bed\tfor\tdiffere\bt\trelatio\bs.\t I\b\tHowNet\tthe\tra\bge\tof\tattribute\ttypes\tof\trelatio\bs\tis\tco\bstrai\bed\tby\ttheir\tattribute-values|屬性 值.\t For\t i\bsta\bce,\t the\t color-values\t are\t blue|藍,\t red|紅,\t gree\b|綠\t a\bd\t so\t forth.\t Other\t ki\bd\t of\t sema\btic\troles\tare\tparticipa\bts\tof\teve\bts,\tsuch\tas\tage\bt,\ttheme,\tgoal,\t...,\tetc.\tTheir\tra\bge\tvalues\t are\tco\bstrai\bed\tdepe\bdi\bg\tof\tthe\thead\teve\bts.\t

Fu\bctio\bs\t are\t special\t ki\bds\t of\t relatio\bs\t which\t map\t co\bcepts\t to\t \bew\t co\bcepts\t i\b\t the\t same\t domai\b.\tThis\tterm\tshould\t\bot\tbe\tco\bfused\twith\tits\tmore\tge\beral\tuse\ti\b\tcompositio\bal\tsema\btics\t or\tlogic.\tThey\tdo\t\bot\testablish\tthematic\trelatio\bs\tor\tproperty\tattributes\tof\tco\bcepts,\tbut\trather\t tra\bsform\t co\bcepts\t i\bto\t \bew\t co\bcepts\t i\b\t the\t same\t domai\b.\t Fu\bctio\bs\t have\t compositio\bal\t properties.\t New\t fu\bctio\bs\t ca\b\t be\t co\bstructed\t by\t compositio\b\t of\t ma\by\t fu\bctio\bs\t of\t the\t same\t type.\tFor\ti\bsta\bce,\tthe\tki\bship\tfu\bctio\b\tFather(Father(x))\tde\botes\tthe\tgra\bdfather\tof\tx\ta\bd\tthe\t directio\b\t fu\bctio\b\t North(East())\t de\botes\t the\t directio\b\t of\t \borth-east.\t Both\t are\t composed\t fu\bctio\bs\tof\tbasic\tfu\bctio\bs.\tFu\bctio\b\texpressio\b\tis\twritte\b\tas\trel(x).\t(7)\tis\ta\ttypical\texample.\t \t (7)\tveh\tcle hea\fl\tgh\b車燈\t \t def:\t {PartOf({La\bdVehicle|車 }):\t purpose={illumi\bate|照 射 :\t target={road|路 },\t i\bstrume\bt={~}}}.\t \t

sections.title: 5 Applic\ttions of E-Ho\bNet
paragraphs: There\t is\t still\t a\t lo\bg\t way\t ahead\t to\t achieve\t fully\t automatic\t sema\btic\t compositio\b\t a\bd\t \batural\t la\bguage\tu\bdersta\bdi\bg.\tFrom\tsy\btactic\tparsi\bg,\tto\tsema\btic\tcompositio\b\tu\btil\tca\bo\bical\tse\bse\t represe\btatio\b,\tthere\tare\tma\by\tresearch\tproblems\ta\bd\tdifficulties\t\beeded\tto\tbe\tresolved,\tsuch\tas\t robust\t parsi\bg\t tech\bology,\t sema\btic\t role\t assig\bme\bt,\t se\bse\t disambiguatio\b,\t u\bk\bow\b\t word\t ide\btificatio\b,\taspectual\t\bormalizatio\b,...,\tetc.\tstill\tbei\bg\thot\tresearch\ttopics.\tE-HowNet\tdid\b’t\t solve\t the\t problems\t directly,\t but\t it\t ca\b\t help\t i\b\t solvi\bg\t those\t problems.\t Other\t tha\b\t ge\beral\t fu\bctio\bs\t of\t sema\btic\t ge\beralizatio\b\t a\bd\t specializatio\b,\t some\t specific\t applicatio\bs\t of\t E-HowNet\tare\texemplified\tbelow.\t

I\b\t additio\b\t to\t part-of-speeches,\t co\bceptual\t features\t (sememes\t i\b\t E-HowNet)\t became\t promi\be\bt\tfeatures\twhile\tapplyi\bg\tstatistical\t parsi\bg\t models\t i\b\t resolvi\bg\t ambiguous\t sy\btactic\t structures.\tWe\tca\b\tuse\tco\bceptual\tassociatio\b\tstre\bgth\ti\bstead\tof\tword\tassociatio\b\tstre\bgth\tto\t overcome\tdata\tsparse\bess\tproblem.\tFor\ti\bsta\bce,\teve\b\tcoarse-grai\bed\tsema\btic\ttypes\tof\teve\bt,\t object,\t attribute,\t a\bd\t attribute-value\t have\t sig\bifica\btly\t differe\bt\t sy\btactic\t behaviors.\t For\t i\bsta\bce,\t sy\btactic\t ambiguity\t of\tTrans\t\b\tve-Verb + N Np or Vp\t is\t hardly\t resolved\t by\t sy\btactic\trules.\t \t (11)\tVp:\t檢驗\t行李、食物、藥物\t\tv.s.\tNp:\t檢驗\t人員、方法、儀器\t\t \t I\b\t(11),\t行李\tluggage,\t食物\tfood,\t藥物\tmedici\be\tare\tobject\ttype\ta\bd人員\tage\bt,\t方法\tmethod,\t 儀器\ti\bstrume\bt\tare\tattribute\ttype.\tThe\tabove\texamples\ti\bdicate\tthe\tprefere\bces\tof\tTrans\t\b\tve-Verb + Objec\b Vp an\f Trans\t\b\tve-Verb + a\b\br\tbu\be Np.\t

For\tthe\ttask\tof\tsema\btic\trole\tassig\bme\bt,\tword\tse\bse\treprese\btatio\bs\tof\tE-HowNet\tprovide\t ample\t of\t co\bceptual\t relatio\bs\t as\t trai\bi\bg\t data\t for\t applyi\bg\t machi\be\t lear\bi\bg\t models\t to\t determi\be\tsema\btic\trelatio\b\tbetwee\b\ttwo\tdepe\bde\bt\tco\bcepts/words.\t

For\tthe\ttask\tof\tse\bse\tdisambiguatio\b,\tlexical\tco\bte\bt\tof\tE-How\bet\tprovide\t\bot\to\bly\tdiffere\bt\t se\bses\t of\t each\t word\t but\t also\t prefere\bce\t of\t co\bceptual\t relatio\bs,\t i.e.\t associatio\b\t stre\bgth\t betwee\b\ttwo\tco\bcepts.\tThe\tabove\ti\bformatio\b\tis\tesse\btial\tfor\tthe\ttask\tof\tse\bse\tdisambiguatio\b.\t\t

I\b\t real\t text,\t there\t are\t 3-5%\t of\t u\bk\bow\b\t words.\t It\t is\t o\be\t of\t major\t obstacle\t for\t \batural\t la\bguage\t u\bdersta\bdi\bg.\t However\t i\b\t Chi\bese\t ma\by\t u\bk\bow\b\t words\t are\t \bewly\t coi\bed\t compou\bds\ta\bd\tthey\tpreserve\tcertai\b\tdegree\tof\tsema\btic\tcompositio\bality,\ti.e.\ttheir\tse\bse\ta\bd\t pos\t ca\b\t be\t predicted\t by\t sema\btic\t compositio\b\t of\t morphemes\t (Chu\bg\t a\bd\t Che\b,\t 2009).\t We\t have\timpleme\bted\ta\b\tautomatic\tE-HowNet\tse\bse\tderivatio\b\tsystem\tfor\tdetermi\bative-measure\t compou\bds\tby\tsema\btic\tcompositio\b\tmethod\ta\bd\tobtai\bed\ta\tvery\tpromisi\bg\tresult\t (Tai\t et\t al.,\t 2009).\t

paragraphs: HowNet\tproposed\ta\t\bew\tmodel\tto\treprese\bt\tlexical\tk\bowledge\ta\bd\ti\bspired\tus\tto\texpa\bd\tthis\t framework\t to\t achieve\t the\t task\t of\t mecha\bical\t \batural\t la\bguage\t u\bdersta\bdi\bg.\t E-HowNet\t co\bfi\bes\teach\tco\bcept\tto\ta\tsema\btic\ttype,\ta\bd\tdefi\bes\tthe\trelatio\b\tbetwee\b\tthese\ttypes.\tHe\bce\t we\t have\t a\t co\bsiste\bt\t method\t for\t represe\bti\bg\t co\bcepts,\t a\bd\t computers\t ca\b\t store\t a\bd\t relate\t mea\bi\bgs.\t\t

\fema\btic\t compositio\b\t is\t a\t crucial\t compo\be\bt\t of\t li\bguistic\t a\balysis.\t We\t have\t proposed\t a\t u\biform\treprese\btatio\b\tsystem\tfor\tboth\tfu\bctio\b\twords\ta\bd\tco\bte\bt\twords\tto\tachieve\tsema\btic\t compositio\b,\tsuch\tthat\tmea\bi\bg\treprese\btatio\bs\tfor\tmorphemes,\twords,\tphrases,\ta\bd\tse\bte\bces\t ca\b\t be\t u\biformly\t represe\bted\t u\bder\t the\t same\t framework.\t New\t co\bcepts\t ca\b\t be\t defi\bed\t by\t previously\t k\bow\b\t co\bcepts\t a\bd\t defi\bitio\bs\t ca\b\t be\t dy\bamically\t decomposed\t i\bto\t lower\t level\t represe\btatio\bs\tu\btil\tthe\tgrou\bd-level\tdefi\bitio\b\tis\treached.\tNear-ca\bo\bical\treprese\btatio\b\tthus\t ca\b\t be\t achieved\t at\t a\t suitable\t level\t of\t represe\btatio\b\t for\t sy\bo\byms\t or\t paraphrases.\t We\t also\t 7 \t suggested\t compositio\bal\t fu\bctio\bs\t to\t exte\bd\t the\t expressio\b\t of\t \bew\t co\bcepts\t a\bd\t make\t word\t a\bd\tphrase\tdefi\bitio\bs\tmore\tdetailed\ta\bd\taccurate.\t

There\tare\tstill\tma\by\tobstacles\tto\tachievi\bg\tthe\tgoal\tof\tautomatically\textracti\bg\tk\bowledge\t from\t la\bguage.\t Apart\t from\t se\bse\t disambiguatio\b\t a\bd\t sema\btic\t role\t labeli\bg,\t discord\t betwee\b\t sy\btactic\t structures\t a\bd\t their\t associated\t sema\btic\t represe\btatio\bs\t is\t a\bother\t critical\t problem.\t We\t \beed\t to\t determi\be\t rules\t which\t map\t from\t coarse\t sy\btactic\t structures\t to\t fi\be-grai\bed\t sema\btic\trelatio\bs.\tGap\tfilli\bg\tprocesses,\tas\tdiscussed\there,\t\beed\tto\tbe\t a\b\t i\btegral\t part\t of\t the\t mecha\bism.\tOur\tfuture\tresearch\twill\tco\bti\bue\tto\taddress\tthese\tproblems.\t\t
